_comment: Engine Subsystems Configuration - Controls which subsystems are initialized during engine startup

_usage.core_subsystems: Remove subsystem name from 'core.subsystems' array to disable it
_usage.optional_subsystems: Set 'enabled: false' in subsystem config to disable it
_usage.defaults: If this file is missing or malformed, all subsystems default to enabled

audio.description: Audio subsystem using FMOD for sound playback and 3D audio

config._note: sAudioSystemConfig currently has no fields - reserved for future expansion

input.description: Input subsystem for keyboard, mouse, and gamepad input handling

config._note: sInputSystemConfig currently has no fields - reserved for future expansion

math.description: Math utilities including RandomNumberGenerator for procedural generation

config._note: Set defaultSeed to a number for deterministic random generation, or null for time-based seed

network.description: Network subsystem for multiplayer and network communication (not yet implemented)

config._note: NetworkTCPSubsystem exists but not yet integrated into GEngine::Construct()
Window configuration is ACTIVELY READ from this config (Engine.cpp lines 265-294)

renderer.description: Rendering subsystem using DirectX 11 (configured in core.subsystems)

config._note: Renderer configuration is currently hardcoded in Engine.cpp lines 287-290

resource.description: Resource management and asset loading (configured in core.subsystems as ResourceSubsystem)

config._note: ResourceSubsystem threadCount is currently hardcoded to 4 in Engine.cpp line 337

script.description: Script subsystem using V8 JavaScript engine for dual-language game logic

config._note: All script settings are ACTIVELY READ from this config (Engine.cpp lines 399-410)

core.description: Core subsystems - Remove from array to disable. Warning: Disabling core subsystems may cause crashes if dependent systems are enabled.

_configuration_notes.LogSubsystem: Uses separate LogConfig.json file for detailed configuration
_configuration_notes.EventSystem: No configurable options (uses empty sEventSystemConfig struct)
_configuration_notes.JobSystem: Thread count auto-calculated: (CPU_cores - 2) generic threads + 1 I/O thread (Engine.cpp lines 191-200)
_configuration_notes.Window: FULLY CONFIGURABLE via subsystems.platform.config (windowType, aspectRatio, windowTitle)
_configuration_notes.ImGuiSubsystem: Hardcoded: Uses Renderer and Window references - DevConsole-aware input capture

dependencies.Renderer: Required by DevConsole, ResourceSubsystem, DebugRenderSystem, ImGuiSubsystem
dependencies.ImGuiSubsystem: Requires Renderer, Window - Provides debug UI with DevConsole integration
dependencies.DevConsole: Requires Renderer - Can be safely disabled

_examples.disable_imgui: Remove 'ImGuiSubsystem' from core.subsystems array (disables debug UI)
_examples.custom_rng_seed: Set subsystems.math.config.defaultSeed to a number (e.g., 12345) for deterministic randomness
_examples.change_inspector_port: Set subsystems.script.config.inspectorPort to desired port number
_examples.change_window_title: Set subsystems.platform.config.windowTitle to your desired title
